================
K10
================

Introduction
================

The K10 microarchitecture succeeded :doc:`K8` and preceded :doc:`Bulldozer`.
Sockets using this microarchitecture:

* :doc:`/AMD/FM1`
* :doc:`/AMD/AM2+`
* :doc:`/AMD/AM3`

Codenames
================

* Agena
* Toliman
* Deneb
* Callisto
* Heka
* Thuban
* Rana
* Regor
* Propus
* Zosma
* Sargas (Sempron only)
* Llano (APU only)
